cards.name: Innervate
cards.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

cards.name: Innervate
cards.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

cards.name: Zombie Chow
cards.flavor: Zombie.  It's what's for dinner.

cards.name: Wild Growth
cards.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

cards.name: Wild Growth
cards.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

cards.name: Wrath
cards.flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

cards.name: Savage Roar
cards.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

cards.name: Savage Roar
cards.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

cards.name: Big Game Hunter
cards.flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

cards.name: Shade of Naxxramas
cards.flavor: The Shades of Naxxramas hate the living. They even have a slur they use to refer them: Livers.

cards.name: Swipe
cards.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

cards.name: Swipe
cards.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

cards.name: Keeper of the Grove
cards.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

cards.name: Piloted Shredder
cards.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

cards.name: Druid of the Claw
cards.flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

cards.name: Loatheb
cards.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

cards.name: Sludge Belcher
cards.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

cards.name: Force of Nature
cards.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

cards.name: Emperor Thaurissan
cards.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

cards.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
cards.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

cards.name: Ancient of Lore
cards.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

cards.flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

cards.name: Cenarius
cards.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

cards.flavor: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.

cards.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

cards.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

cards.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

cards.name: Arcane Golem
cards.flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

cards.flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

cards.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

cards.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

cards.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

cards.name: Alexstrasza
cards.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

cards.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

cards.flavor: Zombie.  It's what's for dinner.

cards.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

cards.flavor: It isn't really a circle.

cards.flavor: It isn't really a circle.

cards.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

cards.name: Power Word: Shield
cards.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

cards.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

cards.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

cards.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

cards.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

cards.name: Shrinkmeister
cards.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

cards.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

cards.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

cards.name: Deadly Poison
cards.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

cards.name: Deadly Poison
cards.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

cards.name: Southsea Deckhand
cards.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

cards.name: Blade Flurry
cards.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

cards.flavor: "Void!  Here, void!  Here, buddy!"

cards.flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

cards.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

cards.name: Mal'Ganis

cards.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

cards.name: Execute
cards.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

cards.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

cards.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

cards.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

cards.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

cards.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

cards.flavor: Always roll need.

cards.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

cards.name: Frothing Berserker
cards.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

cards.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

cards.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

cards.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

cards.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

cards.flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

cards.name: Grommash Hellscream
cards.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

cards.name: Backstab
cards.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

cards.name: Backstab
cards.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

cards.name: Preparation
cards.flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

cards.name: Preparation
cards.flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

cards.name: Deadly Poison
cards.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

cards.name: Deadly Poison
cards.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

cards.name: Southsea Deckhand
cards.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

cards.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

cards.name: Blade Flurry
cards.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

cards.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

cards.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

cards.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

cards.name: Sludge Belcher
cards.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

cards.name: Siphon Soul
cards.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

cards.name: Emperor Thaurissan
cards.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

cards.name: Dr. Boom
cards.flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

cards.name: Lord Jaraxxus
cards.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

cards.name: Mountain Giant
cards.flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

cards.name: Mountain Giant
cards.flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

cards.name: Molten Giant
cards.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

cards.name: Molten Giant
cards.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

cards.name: Circle of Healing
cards.flavor: It isn't really a circle.

cards.name: Circle of Healing
cards.flavor: It isn't really a circle.

cards.name: Light of the Naaru
cards.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

cards.name: Light of the Naaru
cards.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

cards.name: Power Word: Shield
cards.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

cards.name: Power Word: Shield
cards.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

cards.name: Northshire Cleric
cards.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

cards.name: Northshire Cleric
cards.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

cards.name: Shrinkmeister
cards.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

cards.name: Shrinkmeister
cards.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

cards.name: Wild Pyromancer
cards.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

cards.name: Wild Pyromancer
cards.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

cards.name: Shadow Word: Death
cards.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

cards.name: Shadow Word: Death
cards.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

cards.name: Thoughtsteal
cards.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

cards.name: Thoughtsteal
cards.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

cards.name: Injured Blademaster
cards.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

cards.name: Injured Blademaster
cards.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

cards.name: Shadow Madness
cards.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

cards.name: Shadow Madness
cards.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

cards.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
cards.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

cards.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
cards.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

cards.name: Harrison Jones
cards.flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

cards.name: Sludge Belcher
cards.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

cards.name: Sludge Belcher
cards.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

cards.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
cards.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

cards.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
cards.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

cards.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
cards.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

cards.name: Dr. Boom
cards.flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

cards.name: Ysera
cards.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

cards.name: Inner Rage
cards.flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

cards.name: Execute
cards.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

cards.name: Execute
cards.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

cards.name: Whirlwind
cards.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

cards.name: Whirlwind
cards.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

cards.name: Fiery War Axe
cards.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

cards.name: Fiery War Axe
cards.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

cards.name: Battle Rage
cards.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

cards.name: Battle Rage
cards.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

cards.name: Armorsmith
cards.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

cards.name: Armorsmith
cards.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

cards.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

cards.name: Cruel Taskmaster
cards.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

cards.name: Unstable Ghoul
cards.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.

cards.name: Acolyte of Pain
cards.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

cards.name: Acolyte of Pain
cards.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

cards.name: Frothing Berserker
cards.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

cards.name: Frothing Berserker
cards.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

cards.name: Warsong Commander
cards.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

cards.name: Warsong Commander
cards.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

cards.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord

cards.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord

cards.name: Dread Corsair
cards.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

cards.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

cards.name: Gnomish Inventor
cards.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

cards.name: Gnomish Inventor
cards.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

cards.name: Grim Patron
cards.flavor: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!

cards.flavor: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!

cards.name: Emperor Thaurissan
cards.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

cards.name: Grommash Hellscream
cards.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

cards.name: Earth Shock
cards.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

cards.name: Earth Shock
cards.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

cards.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

cards.flavor: Zombie.  It's what's for dinner.

cards.flavor: Snap! This card! Pop!

cards.name: Crackle
cards.flavor: Snap! This card! Pop!

cards.name: Flametongue Totem
cards.flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

cards.name: Flametongue Totem

cards.flavor: Arachnofauxbia: Fear of fake spiders.

cards.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

cards.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

cards.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

cards.name: Lightning Storm
cards.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

cards.name: Mana Tide Totem
cards.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

cards.name: Defender of Argus
cards.flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

cards.name: Kezan Mystic
cards.flavor: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

cards.name: Piloted Shredder
cards.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

cards.name: Piloted Shredder
cards.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

cards.name: Doomhammer
cards.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

cards.name: Azure Drake
cards.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

cards.name: Azure Drake
cards.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

cards.name: Loatheb
cards.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

cards.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

cards.name: Dr. Boom
cards.flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

cards.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
cards.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.
